original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o //🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: I will not stand in volitional factors, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, existence, birth, or old age and death.🔽If one asks why, Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste /
translated: it is because🔽form is empty of form.🔽The emptiness of form is not form.

original: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs ma lags /
translated: Emptiness is not other than form,

original: gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: and form is not other than emptiness.🔽Form itself is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so //
translated: and emptiness itself is form.

original: tshor ba tshor bas stong ste /🔽tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba ma lags /
analyzed: tshor ba tshor bas stong ste / tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba ma lags /
translated: Feeling is empty of feeling.🔽The emptiness of feeling is not feeling.

original: tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than feeling,🔽and feeling is not other than emptiness.🔽Feeling itself is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
translated: and emptiness itself is feeling.

original: 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ste /
analyzed: 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ste /
translated: Perception is empty of perception.

original: 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes ma lags /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of perception is not perception.

original: 'du shes las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: 'du shes las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than perception.🔽Perception itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so //
translated: Emptiness itself is perception.

original: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste /🔽'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed ma lags /
analyzed: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed ma lags /
translated: “Formations are empty of formations.🔽The emptiness of formations is not formations.

original: @180b 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: @180b 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than formations.🔽Formations themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do //🔽rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do // rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is formations.🔽“Consciousness is empty of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of consciousness is not consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than consciousness.🔽Consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o; ;bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o; ;bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Emptiness itself is consciousness.

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: For this reason, Blessed One, when bodhisattva great beings stand in the perfection of wisdom,

original: des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not stand in form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not stand in feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de'ang 'di ltar mig mig gis stong ste /🔽mig gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig ma lags /
analyzed: de'ang 'di ltar mig mig gis stong ste / mig gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig ma lags /
translated: the eye is empty of the eye.🔽The emptiness of the eye is not the eye.

original: mig las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: mig las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the eye,🔽and the eye is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig go /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig go /
translated: The eye itself is emptiness; emptiness itself is the eye.

original: rna ba rna bas stong ste /🔽rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rna ba ma lags /
analyzed: rna ba rna bas stong ste / rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rna ba ma lags /
translated: The ear is empty of the ear.🔽The emptiness of the ear is not the ear.

original: rna ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rna ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the ear,🔽and the ear is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o //
translated: The ear itself is emptiness; emptiness itself is the ear.

original: sna snas stong ste /
analyzed: sna snas stong ste /
translated: The nose is empty of the nose.

original: sna'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sna ma lags /
analyzed: sna'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sna ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the nose is not the nose.

original: sna las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sna las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the nose.🔽The nose itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sna'o //🔽lce lces stong ste /🔽lce'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa @181a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sna'o // lce lces stong ste / lce'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa @181a *//
translated: Emptiness itself is the nose.🔽The tongue is empty of the tongue.

original: de'ang lce ma lags /
analyzed: de'ang lce ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the tongue is not the tongue.

original: lce las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lce las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the tongue.🔽The tongue itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lce'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lce'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the tongue.

original: lus lus kyis stong ste /🔽lus kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lus ma lags /
analyzed: lus lus kyis stong ste / lus kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lus ma lags /
translated: The body is empty of the body.🔽The emptiness of the body is not the body.

original: lus las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lus las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the body.🔽The body itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the body.

original: yid yid kyis stong ste /🔽yid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid ma lags /
analyzed: yid yid kyis stong ste / yid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid ma lags /
translated: The mind is empty of the mind.🔽The emptiness of the mind is not the mind.

original: yid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: yid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the mind.

original: yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The mind itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid do //
translated: Emptiness is also mind.

original: gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste /🔽gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste / gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs ma lags /
translated: Form is empty of form.🔽The emptiness of form is not form.

original: gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than form.🔽Form itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so //🔽sgra sgras stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so // sgra sgras stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is form.🔽Sound is empty of sound.

original: sgra'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sgra ma lags /
analyzed: sgra'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sgra ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of sound is not sound.

original: sgra las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sgra las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than sound.🔽Sound itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is sound.

original: dri dris stong ste /🔽dri'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang dri ma lags /
analyzed: dri dris stong ste / dri'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang dri ma lags /
translated: Smell is empty of smell.🔽The emptiness of smell is not smell.

original: dri las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: dri las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than smell.🔽Smell itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dri'o //🔽ro ros stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dri'o // ro ros stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is smell.🔽Taste is empty of taste.

original: ro'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ro ma lags /
analyzed: ro'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ro ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of taste is not taste.

original: ro las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: ro las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: “Taste is not empty of taste, but taste is empty.🔽“Touch is not empty of touch, but touch is empty.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ro'o //🔽reg reg gis stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ro'o // reg reg gis stong ste /
translated: “Mental phenomena are not empty of mental phenomena, but mental phenomena are empty.🔽“The eye consciousness is not empty of the eye consciousness, but the eye consciousness is empty.

original: reg gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang reg ma lags /🔽reg las gud na'ang @181b stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: reg gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang reg ma lags / reg las gud na'ang @181b stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: “The ear consciousness is not empty of the ear consciousness, but the ear consciousness is empty.

original: reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid /🔽stong pa nyid kyang reg go /🔽chos chos kyis stong ste /
analyzed: reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid / stong pa nyid kyang reg go / chos chos kyis stong ste /
translated: “The nose consciousness is not empty of the nose consciousness, but the nose consciousness is empty.🔽“The tongue consciousness is not empty of the tongue consciousness, but the tongue consciousness is empty.🔽“The body consciousness is not empty of the body consciousness, but the body consciousness is empty.

original: chos kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos ma lags /🔽chos las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: chos kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos ma lags / chos las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: “The mind consciousness is not empty of the mind consciousness, but the mind consciousness is empty.🔽“The eye constituent is not empty of the eye constituent, but the eye constituent is empty.

original: chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid /🔽stong pa nyid kyang chos so //
analyzed: chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid / stong pa nyid kyang chos so //
translated: “The form constituent is not empty of the form constituent, but the form constituent is empty.🔽“The eye-consciousness constituent is not empty of the eye-consciousness constituent, but the eye-consciousness constituent is empty.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
translated: “The ear constituent is not empty of the ear constituent, but the ear constituent is empty.🔽“The sound constituent is not empty of the sound constituent, but the sound constituent is empty.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: “The ear-consciousness constituent is not empty of the ear-consciousness constituent, but the ear-consciousness constituent is empty.🔽“The nose constituent is not empty of the nose constituent, but the nose constituent is empty.🔽“The smell constituent is not empty of the smell constituent, but the smell constituent is empty.🔽“The nose-consciousness constituent is not empty of the nose-consciousness constituent, but the nose-consciousness constituent is empty.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: “The tongue constituent is not empty of the tongue constituent, but the tongue constituent is empty.🔽“The taste constituent is not empty of the taste constituent, but the taste constituent is empty.🔽“The tongue-consciousness constituent is not empty of the tongue-consciousness constituent, but the tongue-consciousness constituent is empty.🔽“The body constituent is not empty of the body constituent, but the body constituent is empty.🔽“The tactile constituent is not empty of the tactile constituent, but the tactile constituent is empty.🔽“The body-consciousness constituent is not empty of the body-consciousness constituent, but the body-consciousness constituent is empty.🔽“The thinking-mind constituent is not empty of the thinking-mind constituent, but

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The eye consciousness is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Emptiness is also the eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
translated: The ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, and thinking-mind consciousness are empty of the thinking-mind consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the thinking-mind consciousness is not the thinking-mind consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the thinking-mind consciousness, emptiness does not exist.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The thinking-mind consciousness is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
translated: Emptiness is also the thinking-mind consciousness.🔽Eye contact is empty of eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of eye contact is not eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: emptiness is not other than eye contact.🔽Eye contact is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: Emptiness is eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te @182a *//
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te @182a *//
translated: Ear contact,

original: reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
analyzed: reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
translated: nose contact, tongue contact, body contact, and thinking-mind contact are empty of thinking-mind contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of thinking-mind contact is not thinking-mind contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than thinking-mind contact.🔽Thinking-mind contact is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: Emptiness is thinking-mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
translated: “Feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of eye is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of eye.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of eye, there is no emptiness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of eye is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of eye.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of ear, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of nose, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of tongue, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of body, and the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of thinking are empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of thinking.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i @182b rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i @182b rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: The emptiness of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mind is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mind.🔽Apart from the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mind, emptiness does not exist.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mind is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong ste /
translated: Emptiness is the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mind.🔽The earth element is empty of the earth element.

original: sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sa'i khams ma lags /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sa'i khams ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the earth element is not the earth element.

original: sa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the earth element, emptiness does not exist.🔽The earth element is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so //
translated: Emptiness is the earth element.

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste /🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags /
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags /
translated: the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element are empty of the consciousness element.🔽The emptiness of the consciousness element is not the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the consciousness element,🔽and the consciousness element is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: Consciousness is emptiness; emptiness is consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ste /🔽ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ma rig pa ma lags /
analyzed: ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ste / ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ma rig pa ma lags /
translated: ignorance is empty of ignorance.🔽The emptiness of ignorance is not ignorance.

original: ma rig pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: ma rig pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than ignorance,🔽and ignorance is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //
translated: Ignorance is emptiness; emptiness is ignorance.

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / @183a *//
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / @183a *//
translated: consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving, grasping,

original: srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi rga shis stong ste /
analyzed: srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi rga shis stong ste /
translated: existence, birth, and aging and death are empty of aging and death.

original: rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rga shi ma lags /
analyzed: rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rga shi ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of aging and death is not aging and death.

original: rga shi las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rga shi las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from aging and death, emptiness does not exist.🔽Aging and death are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o //
translated: Emptiness is aging and death.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: for these reasons, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not dwell on ignorance,

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: and they should not stand in the knowledge of a worthy one,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: in the knowledge of a pratyekabuddha,🔽or in the knowledge of a buddha.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: “Moreover, Lord, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in the perfection of giving.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?🔽Lord, it is because the perfection of giving is empty of the perfection of giving.

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of giving is not the perfection of giving.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the perfection of giving, there is no emptiness.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The perfection of generosity itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Emptiness is the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang @183b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang @183b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: They should not stand in the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
translated: And why is that?🔽It is because the perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The emptiness of the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the perfection of wisdom,🔽and the perfection of wisdom is not other than emptiness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid; stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid; stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom itself is emptiness, and emptiness is the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: for this reason, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not abide in the six perfections.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: further, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: they should not abide in the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste /
translated: it is because the four establishments of mindfulness are empty of the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid; stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid; stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are emptiness, and emptiness is the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag @184a *//
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag @184a *//
translated: The emptiness of the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening,🔽and path is not the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening,

original: rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
analyzed: rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
translated: and path.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: They should not abide in the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, the meditative stabilizations, the clairvoyances, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: the great love, the great compassion, or the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags /
translated: Blessed One,🔽it is because the distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽The emptiness of the distinct attributes of a buddha is not the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the distinct attributes of a buddha, there is no emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: the powers of a buddha are empty of the powers of a buddha,

original: stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //
translated: and emptiness is the powers of a buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: for these reasons, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas @184b par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas @184b par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not settle on the distinct qualities of a buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: further, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: they should not settle on letters,

original: yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: they should not settle on the accomplishment of letters,

original: gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: they should not settle on the expression of one,

original: gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: they should not settle on the expression of two,

original: tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: and they should not settle on the expression of many.🔽If you ask why, Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: it is because

original: de ni 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ge rnams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ge rnams kyis stong ste /
translated: It is thus: the letters are empty of the letters.

original: yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yi ge rnams ma lags /🔽yi ge rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te; yi ge rnams kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yi ge rnams ma lags / yi ge rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te; yi ge rnams kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of the letters is not the letters.🔽Apart from the letters, there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams so //
translated: The letters are emptiness, and emptiness is the letters.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: for this reason, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not dwell on the letters.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: further, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: they should not dwell on the superknowledges.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste /
translated: It is thus that the superknowledges are empty of the superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /
translated: The emptiness of the superknowledges

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags /
translated: is not the superknowledges,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: and emptiness is not other than the superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa nyid kyang @185a *//
analyzed: mngon par shes pa nyid kyang @185a *//
translated: The superknowledges

original: stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid /
translated: are emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so //
translated: and emptiness is the superknowledges.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: for these reasons, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not settle on the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: They should not settle on the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste /
translated: it is thus that the dhāraṇī gateways are empty of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the dhāraṇī gateways is not the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the dhāraṇī gateways there is no emptiness.🔽The dhāraṇī gateways are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: for these reasons great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste / de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the notion that physical forms are impermanent.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: If one were to ask why, Blessed One, it is because physical forms are themselves emptiness.

original: de ni 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: It is thus: impermanence of form is empty of impermanence of form.

original: gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of impermanence of form is not impermanence of form.

original: @185b gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: @185b gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from impermanence of form, there is no emptiness.

original: gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Impermanence of form is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid do //
translated: and emptiness is impermanence of form.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: for these reasons, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not dwell on the notion that ‘form is impermanent.’

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: They should not dwell on the notion that ‘feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are impermanent.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: Because impermanence of consciousness is empty of impermanence of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of impermanence of consciousness is not impermanence of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from impermanence of consciousness, emptiness is not apprehended.

original: rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Impermanence of consciousness is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid do //
translated: and emptiness is impermanence of consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: for these reasons, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not dwell on the notion that consciousness is impermanent.

original: gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: They should not dwell on the notion that form is suffering.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: It is thus: form, being suffering, is empty of form, being suffering.

original: gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang @186a *//
analyzed: gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang @186a *//
translated: That emptiness of form, being suffering,

original: gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags /🔽gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags / gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: is not form, being suffering.🔽Apart from form, being suffering, there is no emptiness.

original: gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Form, being suffering, is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do //
translated: and emptiness is form, being suffering.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: for these reasons, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not dwell on the notion that ‘form is suffering.’

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste; de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste; de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: They should not dwell on the notion that ‘feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are suffering.’ And why?

original: de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: Because consciousness as suffering is empty of consciousness as suffering.

original: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of consciousness as suffering is not consciousness as suffering.

original: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from consciousness as suffering, there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do //
translated: Consciousness as suffering is emptiness and emptiness is consciousness as suffering.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: for these reasons, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not dwell on the notion that consciousness is suffering.

original: gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi @186b ste; de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi @186b ste; de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: “Do not dwell on the notion that physical forms are not the self. And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “ ‘Lord, one should not dwell on the notion that feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are not-self;🔽why is it so?

original: de ni 'di ltar gzugs bdag med pa nyid gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gzugs bdag med pa nyid gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: Lord, it is because the very non-self of form is emptiness.

original: gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs bdag med pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs bdag med pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the very non-self of form is not the non-self of form;🔽apart from the non-self of form there is no emptiness,

original: gzugs bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzugs bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: and apart from emptiness there is no non-self of form.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs bdag med pa nyid do //🔽bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs bdag med pa nyid do // bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The non-self of form is indeed emptiness, and emptiness is indeed the non-self of form.

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Lord, for these reasons great bodhisattva beings, when practicing the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: should not dwell on the notion that form is not-self.’🔽“Subhūti then said,🔽‘Lord, one should not dwell on the notion that the eyes are not-self;

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: “One should not dwell on the idea that ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not a self.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: Why is that?🔽It is because the lack of a self in consciousness is empty of the lack of a self in consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /
translated: That emptiness

original: rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid ma lags /🔽rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid ma lags / rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: is not the lack of a self in consciousness.🔽Apart from the lack of a self in consciousness,🔽there is no emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The lack of a self in consciousness is empty.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the lack of a self in consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: for these reasons great bodhisattva beings, when they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi @187a *//
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi @187a *//
translated: Consciousness is not self.🔽

original: bar gnas par mi bgyi'o ////
analyzed: bar gnas par mi bgyi'o ////
translated: “One should not stand in the notion that consciousness is not self.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines

original: bam po bcu pa /
analyzed: bam po bcu pa /

original: gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: “One should not stand in the notion that form is calm.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gzugs zhi ba nyid gzugs zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste /

analyzed: gzugs zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs zhi ba nyid ma lags /
translated: That emptiness of the calm of form is not the calm of form.

original: gzugs zhi ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽gzugs zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzugs zhi ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / gzugs zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the calm of form, emptiness cannot be found.🔽The calm of form is emptiness;

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do //
translated: emptiness is the calm of form.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

original: gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: “One should not abide in the notion that form is calm.

analyzed: tshor ba dang; 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /

analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid / rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid do //
translated: emptiness is the calm of consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems @187b dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhi ba'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //

analyzed: gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: “One should not abide in the notion that form is empty.

analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid /

analyzed: gzugs stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: is empty of the emptiness of form.

analyzed: gzugs stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of form is not the emptiness of form.

original: gzugs stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽gzugs stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzugs stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / gzugs stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs stong pa nyid do //

translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe; chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe; chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: for these reasons great bodhisattva beings, when they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, should not abide in the dharma-constituent,

original: chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste / de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: and they should not abide in the faultless nature of phenomena.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni 'di ltar chos skyon med pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni 'di ltar chos skyon med pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: If you ask why, Blessed One,🔽it is because the faultless nature of phenomena is empty of the faultless nature of phenomena.

original: chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /
analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /
translated: The emptiness of the faultless nature of phenomena is not the faultless nature of phenomena,

original: chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags /🔽chos skyon med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags / chos skyon med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: emptiness does not exist apart from the dharmas that are the limit of reality.

original: chos skyon med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The dharmas that are the limit of reality are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon med pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon med pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the dharmas that are the limit of reality.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha @190b rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha @190b rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: for these reasons great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the dharmas that are the limit of reality.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste / de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: They should not abide in the very limit of reality.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste /
translated: If you ask why, Blessed One,🔽it is because the very limit of reality is empty of the very limit of reality.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /
translated: The emptiness of the very limit of reality

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags /
translated: is not the very limit of reality.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te; yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te; yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the limit of reality;

original: stong pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid do //
translated: the limit of reality is emptiness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: for this reason, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not stand in the limit of reality.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: if bodhisattva great beings, when practicing the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na /
analyzed: thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na /
translated: through lack of skill in means stand in form with a mind that stands in the view of a self and what belongs to a self,

original: de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /
analyzed: de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /
translated: then they practice the accumulation of form,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: but they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na /
analyzed: gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na /
translated: If they stand in feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,

original: de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /
analyzed: de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /
translated: they practice the performance of consciousness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi @191a *//
analyzed: mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi @191a *//
translated: Because bodhisattva great beings who practice the performance do not take hold of the perfection of wisdom,

original: 'gyur / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'gyur / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: do not enter into the yoga of the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par /
translated: and without completing the perfection of wisdom

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: do not emerge into the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: if bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi pa dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la gnas na /
analyzed: thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi pa dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la gnas na /
translated: “If, without skillful means, they stand in the knowledge of all aspects with a mind that stands in the idea of ‘I’ and ‘mine,’

original: de yang dag pa'i mtha'i mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /
analyzed: de yang dag pa'i mtha'i mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /
translated: then they practice the performance of the knowledge of all aspects,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: but do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur /
translated: Because bodhisattva great beings who practice the performance do not take hold of the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: do not enter into the yoga of the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par /
translated: and without completing the perfection of wisdom

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: do not emerge into the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: it is because form is ungraspable.

original: gzugs kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du gzugs ma lags /
translated: That nonapprehending of form is also not form because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su bzung ba @191b ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su bzung ba @191b ma mchis pa ste /
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are nonapprehending.

original: rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rnam par shes ba ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rnam par shes ba ma lags /
translated: That nonapprehending of consciousness is also not consciousness because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: Up to the very limit of reality is nonapprehending.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang /
translated: That nonapprehending of the very limit of reality is also not the very limit of reality

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags te /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags te /
translated: because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis so //
translated: That perfection of wisdom is also nonapprehending because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe; de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du yongs su brtag par bgyi ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe; de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du yongs su brtag par bgyi ste /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should investigate all phenomena as emptiness by nature.

original: ci nas kyang chos gang la'ang yid rnam par mi rgyu ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o //
analyzed: ci nas kyang chos gang la'ang yid rnam par mi rgyu ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o //
translated: They should investigate in such a way that their minds do not engage with any phenomenon.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste /
translated: this is the bodhisattva great beings’ absorption maṇḍala called the complete lack of appropriation of all phenomena.

original: rgya che ba /
analyzed: rgya che ba /
translated: It is vast,

original: phul du bgyi ba /
analyzed: phul du bgyi ba /
translated: supreme,

original: tshad ma mchis pa; tshad ma mchis par nges pa /
analyzed: tshad ma mchis pa; tshad ma mchis par nges pa /
translated: infinite, and certain to be infinite.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing /
translated: It cannot be taken away by any hearers or solitary buddhas,

original: de dag dang thun mong ma lags pa ste /
analyzed: de dag dang thun mong ma lags pa ste /
translated: and it is not shared with them.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
