analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: The bodhisattva great beings who practice that maṇḍala of samādhi will emerge in the state of omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang @192a *//
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang @192a *//
translated: That omniscience is inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, emptiness of ultimate reality, emptiness of the conditioned, emptiness of the unconditioned, emptiness beyond extremes,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of nonrepudiation, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, and emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'o //
translated: emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of essential nature, and emptiness of essential nature of non-entities.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni mtshan mas brjod pa ma lags pa ste /
analyzed: de ni mtshan mas brjod pa ma lags pa ste /
translated: It is not expressed by signs.

original: de ni 'di ltar mtshan ma las nyon mongs pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar mtshan ma las nyon mongs pa 'byung ste /
translated: In this way, afflictions arise from signs.

original: mtshan ma de dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: mtshan ma de dag gang zhe na /
translated: What are those signs?

original: gzugs ni mtshan ma'o; ;tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni mtshan ma'o; ;tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Form is a sign. Feeling is a sign.

original: 'du shes ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: 'du shes ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Perception is a sign.

original: 'du byed ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Formations are a sign.

original: rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Consciousness is a sign.

original: mig ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mig ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The eyes are a sign.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind are signs.

original: gzugs ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Form is a sign.

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Sound, smell, taste, touch, and mental objects are signs.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Eye consciousness is a sign.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang; sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang; sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The ear consciousness, the nose consciousness, the tongue consciousness, the body consciousness, and the mind consciousness are signs.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Eye contact is a sign.

original: @192b rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: @192b rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Ear contact, nose contact, tongue contact, body contact, and mind contact are signs.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The feeling that arises from eye contact is a sign.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
translated: The feeling that arises from ear contact, the feeling that arises from nose contact, the feeling that arises from tongue contact, the feeling that arises from body contact,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: and the feeling that arises from mind contact are signs.

original: sa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The earth element is a sign.

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element are signs.

original: ma rig pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Ignorance is a sign.

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang; tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang; tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Formations, consciousness, name and form, the six sense bases, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and old age and death are signs.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is a sign.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are signs.

original: nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena is a sign.

original: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The emptiness of the external, the emptiness of the internal and the external, and the emptiness of emptiness are signs.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned, and the emptiness of what is beyond extremes are signs.🔽The emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of defining characteristics are signs.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma'o //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma'o // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of the non-existent, and the emptiness of inherent existence are signs.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of defining characteristics, and the emptiness of the non-existent are signs.🔽The emptiness of the non-existent, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of defining characteristics are signs.🔽The emptiness of the non-existent, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of defining characteristics are signs.🔽The emptiness of the non-existent, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of defining characteristics are signs.

original: yang dag par spong @193a *//🔽pa rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong @193a *// pa rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
translated: The emptiness of the non-existent, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of defining characteristics are signs.🔽The emptiness of the non-existent, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of defining characteristics are signs.🔽The emptiness of the non-existent, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of defining characteristics are signs.🔽The emptiness of the non-existent, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of defining characteristics are signs.🔽The emptiness of the non-existent, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of defining characteristics are signs.🔽The emptiness of the non-existent, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of defining characteristics are signs.🔽The emptiness of the non-existent, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of defining characteristics are signs.🔽The emptiness of the non-existent, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of defining characteristics are signs.🔽The emptiness of the non-existent, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of defining characteristics are signs.

original: tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang; mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang; mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
translated: The emptiness of the non

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The superknowledges, the concentrations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are signs.

original: yi ge rnams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: yi ge rnams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The letters are signs.

original: gcig tu brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: gcig tu brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The expression of one is a sign.

original: gnyis su brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: gnyis su brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The expression of two is a sign.

original: tha dad du brjod pa ni mtshan ma ste /
analyzed: tha dad du brjod pa ni mtshan ma ste /
translated: The expression of many is a sign.

original: de ni nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o //
analyzed: de ni nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o //
translated: That is called a mental affliction.

original: gal te de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mtshan mar bzung ba zhig lags na ni /
analyzed: gal te de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mtshan mar bzung ba zhig lags na ni /
translated: If they were to apprehend this perfection of wisdom as a sign,

original: kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then even the wandering mendicant Upatiṣya would have attained faith in this knowledge of a knower of all aspects.

original: dad pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dad pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is faith?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / brten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod @193b pa ste; de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / brten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod @193b pa ste; de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags /
translated: It is to have confidence in the perfection of wisdom, to contemplate it, to have faith in it, to rely on it, to reflect on it, to evaluate it, and to analyze it, and yet not to do so in a manner of apprehending signs.

original: mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du'ang ma lags so //
analyzed: mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du'ang ma lags so //
translated: It is not to do so in a manner of apprehending signlessness.

original: de ltar na de ni mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pas yongs su bzung ba lags te /
analyzed: de ltar na de ni mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pas yongs su bzung ba lags te /
translated: In this way, it is to apprehend signs, signlessness, and the absence of apprehending.

original: kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos par gyur nas /
analyzed: kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos par gyur nas /
translated: The wandering mendicant Maṇi­candrasāradhvaja, having aspired to this wisdom of omniscience,

original: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i ye shes kyis zhugs te /
analyzed: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i ye shes kyis zhugs te /
translated: entered it through the wisdom of a follower of faith.

original: de ltar zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: de ltar zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung /
translated: Having entered it, he did not apprehend form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo //
translated: He did not apprehend feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness.

original: de ni 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa ma dmigs te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa ma dmigs te /
translated: It is because they do not apprehend the grasping at all phenomena that are empty of their own marks.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: 'di ltar des ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: 'di ltar des ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: It is because they do not see that wisdom internally through the mode of realizing and attaining it.🔽They do not see that wisdom externally through the mode of realizing and attaining it.

original: ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom internally and externally through the mode of realizing and attaining it.

original: ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis de las gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis de las gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that wisdom anywhere else through the mode of realizing and attaining it.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: 'di ltar des chos gang gis rtogs par bgyi ba dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar des chos gang gis rtogs par bgyi ba dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: In this way, they do not see any phenomenon that is to be realized, any realization, or anyone who realizes anything.

original: des ye shes de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed @194a *//
analyzed: des ye shes de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed @194a *//
translated: They do not see that wisdom within form.🔽They do not see that wisdom within feeling, perception, formation,

original: dang; rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: dang; rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: or consciousness.

original: ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom outside of form.

original: ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom outside of feeling, perception, formation,🔽or consciousness.

original: ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom within and without form.

original: ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He did not see that wisdom as form, feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: ye shes de gzugs ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de gzugs ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He did not see that wisdom as other than form.

original: ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He did not see that wisdom as other than feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.🔽He did not see that wisdom as the real end.

original: ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i nang du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i nang du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He did not see that wisdom as other than the real end.🔽He did not see that wisdom as the real end and other than the real end.

original: ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He did not see that wisdom as other than the real end.🔽“He did not see that wisdom as the realm of desire, the realm of form, or the formless realm.

original: ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He did not see that wisdom as other than the realm of desire, the realm of form, or the formless realm.🔽He did not see that wisdom as the realm of desire, the realm of form, or the formless realm and other than the realm of desire, the realm of form, or the formless realm.

original: ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He did not see that wisdom as other than the realm of desire, the realm of form, or the formless realm.

original: rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can mos par gyur te /
analyzed: rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can mos par gyur te /
translated: The wandering mendicant Maṇi-dhvaja became devoted to this enumeration.

original: de ltar mos par gyur na /
analyzed: de ltar mos par gyur na /
translated: Having become devoted,

original: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te /
analyzed: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te /
translated: he, following faith, took the true nature as his authority.

original: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te /
analyzed: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te /
translated: He entered into the wisdom of omniscience because he did not apprehend any phenomena.

original: de de ltar mos par gyur nas /
analyzed: de de ltar mos par gyur nas /
translated: Having become devoted in that way,

original: @194b des chos gang yang mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / yid la bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis te /
analyzed: @194b des chos gang yang mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / yid la bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis te /
translated: he did not apprehend any phenomena at all because he did not apprehend any phenomena that were without signs or mental placements.

original: chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis /
analyzed: chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis /
translated: All phenomena are not apprehended.

original: gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba'am /
analyzed: gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba'am /
translated: Because they are not to be apprehended or given up,

original: gtang bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang des ma dmigs te /
analyzed: gtang bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang des ma dmigs te /
translated: he did not apprehend any phenomena at all that were to be apprehended or given up.

original: chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: Because he had no conceit about any phenomena,

original: de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis so //
translated: he did not have any conceit even about nirvāṇa.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: In this way, because all phenomena are ungraspable,

original: gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: form is not grasped, and feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not grasped. Because all phenomena are ungraspable,

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang; stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang; stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
translated: the sense spheres, the elements, dependent origination, the perfections, all the emptinesses, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the noble truths, the concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
translated: the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad @195a *//
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad @195a *//
translated: the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: dang; mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni pha rol ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas /
analyzed: dang; mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni pha rol ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas /
translated: the uncompounded, suchness, the dharma-constituent, the establishment of dharmas, the certification of dharmas, and the very limit of reality—

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: this is the perfection of the other shore of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: 'on kyang smon lam yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang smon lam yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste /
translated: But they do not pass into nirvāṇa in the interval until their prayers have been fulfilled.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The four applications of mindfulness are not fulfilled,

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang; gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang; gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven aspects of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path are not complete,🔽the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessness, the six extrasensory powers, the meditative stabilities, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o //
translated: I will not pass into nirvāṇa without having completed the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar smon lam @195b rnams ni smon lam ma lags /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar smon lam @195b rnams ni smon lam ma lags / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni /
translated: Because aspirations are not aspirations,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags /
translated: the applications of mindfulness are not the applications of mindfulness,🔽the right efforts are not the right efforts,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
translated: the legs of miraculous power are not the legs of miraculous power, the faculties are not the faculties, the powers are not the powers, the limbs of awakening are not the limbs of awakening, the path is not the path, the ten powers of the tathāgatas are not the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses are not the four fearlessnesses, the four kinds of detailed and thorough knowledge are not the four kinds of detailed and thorough knowledge, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang; smon pa med pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang; smon pa med pa dang /
translated: the meditative stabilities, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless meditative absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
translated: the [five] extrasensory powers, the meditative stabilities, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma lags te /🔽de dag ni chos kyang ma lags /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma lags te / de dag ni chos kyang ma lags /
translated: are not the distinct qualities of the buddhas.🔽They are not phenomena,

original: chos ma lags pa'ang ma lags so //
analyzed: chos ma lags pa'ang ma lags so //
translated: nor are they not phenomena.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du /
analyzed: de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du /
translated: in this way, because all phenomena are not apprehended,

original: gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du /
analyzed: gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du /
translated: It is the non-apprehension of form, the non-apprehension of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness, and the non-apprehension of all dharmas.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni /
translated: It is the non-apprehension of the very limit of reality.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings.

original: @196a *// bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: @196a *// bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: further, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi /
translated: they should investigate thus: ‘What is the perfection of wisdom? What is this perfection of wisdom?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig /
translated: What is this perfection of wisdom?

original: ci'i phyir na de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi ste /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi ste /
translated: Why is it called the perfection of wisdom?’

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: de de ltar yongs su rtog cing nye bar sems pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de de ltar yongs su rtog cing nye bar sems pa'i tshe /
translated: when they think and reflect in this way,

original: chos gang med cing mi dmigs pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes gal te de ltar yang dag par rjes su mthong na /
analyzed: chos gang med cing mi dmigs pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes gal te de ltar yang dag par rjes su mthong na /
translated: if they see that the perfection of wisdom is a phenomenon that does not exist and is not found,

original: de yang dag par rjes su mthong ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de yang dag par rjes su mthong ba zhes bya ste /
translated: then that is called seeing reality.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma mchis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma mchis mi dmigs so //
translated: it is because all phenomena do not exist and are not found.

original: gal te 'di ltar chos gang yod pa ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes spyod na /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar chos gang yod pa ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes spyod na /
translated: If they practice thinking, ‘If a phenomenon does not exist and is not found, is that the perfection of wisdom?’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
translated: then they are not practicing the perfection of wisdom.”🔽Then venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to venerable Subhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: chos gang rnams med cing mi dmigs pa yin /
analyzed: chos gang rnams med cing mi dmigs pa yin /
translated: what are the dharmas that do not exist and are not apprehended?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa; tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / @196b 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa; tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / @196b 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of beginning and end, the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because of the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of wisdom does not exist and is not found.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, and the perfection of generosity do not exist and are not found.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang; phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang; phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽“Form is non-existent and non-apprehensible🔽because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics,

original: gzugs med @197a *//
analyzed: gzugs med @197a *//
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: cing mi dmigs so //
translated: and is not perceived.🔽🔽

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not and are not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang; phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / nang stong pa nyid dang; phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,🔽the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang; rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang; rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir; skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir; skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of non-apprehension and the emptiness of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature, the sense-spheres, elements, and dependent origination do not exist and are not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir /
translated: because of the emptiness of internal phenomena and the emptiness of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the perfections do not exist and are not apprehended.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The thirty-seven factors of awakening do not exist and are not apprehended.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms @197b par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms @197b par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessness, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha do not exist and are not apprehended.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: “The result of stream enterer does not exist and is not apprehended because of emptiness of internal phenomena, emptiness of external phenomena, emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, emptiness of emptiness, emptiness of great extent, emptiness of ultimate reality, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, emptiness of the unlimited, emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, emptiness of non-dispersal, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of all things, emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of essential nature, emptiness of all intrinsic defining characteristics, emptiness of non-entities, and emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽“

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects, and the knowledge of all aspects do not exist and are not found.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir /
translated: because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

original: de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: suchness does not exist and is not found.🔽the dharma-constituent, the establishment of dharmas, the certification of dharmas, and the very limit of reality do not exist and are not found.

original: chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing mi dmigs so; ;nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir /
analyzed: chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing mi dmigs so; ;nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir /
translated: Because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: stream enterers do not exist and are not found.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the once-returner, the non-returner, the arhat, the pratyekabuddha, the bodhisattva, and the buddha are non-apprehensible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: because the internal is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of internal phenomena is non-apprehensible.🔽Because the external is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of external phenomena is non-apprehensible.🔽Because the internal and the external are non-apprehensible,

original: nang stong pa @198a *//
analyzed: nang stong pa @198a *//
translated: the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena is non-apprehensible.🔽Because the emptiness of emptiness is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of emptiness is non-apprehensible.🔽Because the emptiness of great extent is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of great extent is non-apprehensible.🔽Because the emptiness of ultimate reality is non-apprehensible,

original: nyid med cing mi dmigs so //🔽phyi dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nyid med cing mi dmigs so // phyi dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality is non-apprehensible.🔽Because the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is non-apprehensible.🔽Because the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is non-apprehensible.🔽Because the emptiness of the unlimited is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of the unlimited is non-apprehensible.🔽Because the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is non-apprehensible.

original: phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the emptiness of inherent existence is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of inherent existence is non-apprehensible.🔽Because the emptiness of all things is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of all things is non-apprehensible.

original: phyi nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyi nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is non-apprehensible.🔽Because the emptiness of non-apprehension is non-apprehensible,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension is non-apprehensible.🔽Because the emptiness of essential nature is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of essential nature is non-apprehensible.🔽Because the emptiness of non-existent entities is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of non-existent entities is non-apprehensible.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the emptiness of essential nature is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of essential nature is non-apprehensible.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the emptiness of non-existent entities is non-apprehensible,🔽the emptiness of non-existent entities

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe sems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med la /
analyzed: gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe sems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med la /
translated: if, when they reflect and contemplate in this way, their minds are not discouraged and do not become utterly discouraged,

original: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur na /
translated: and if they are not terrified, do not become terrified, and are not gripped by fear,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o //
translated: then one should know that the great bodhisattva beings are not separated from the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: ” He asked, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na /
translated: why is it that

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya /
translated: one should know that the great bodhisattva beings are not separated from the transcendent perfection of wisdom?

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: ” Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
translated: form is devoid of the intrinsic nature of form,

original: de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: they know it as it really is.

original: tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba /
analyzed: tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba /
translated: Feeling is devoid of the nature of feeling.

original: 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba /
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba /
translated: Perception is devoid of the nature of perception.

original: 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba /
analyzed: 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba /
translated: Formations are devoid of the nature of formations.

original: rnam par @198b shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: rnam par @198b shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
translated: Consciousness is devoid of the nature of consciousness.

original: de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,🔽they know it as it really is.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni /
translated: the sense domains, elements, and dependent origination

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba /
translated: are devoid of the nature of dependent origination.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of generosity

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyen pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyen pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: the perfection of generosity is devoid of the nature of the perfection of generosity,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba /🔽nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba /🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba / nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du /
translated: the perfection of ethical discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are devoid of the nature of the perfection of wisdom,🔽inner emptiness is devoid of the nature of inner emptiness,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba /
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is devoid of the nature of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven aspects of enlightenment, and the eightfold noble path;🔽the four noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

original: mtshan @199a *// ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: mtshan @199a *// ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessness; the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
translated: The eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha are as follows.🔽🔽

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba /
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are devoid of the intrinsic nature of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba /🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni /
translated: Entry into the stream is devoid of the intrinsic nature of entry into the stream.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba /
translated: The fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, arhatship, individual enlightenment, and the knowledge of all aspects are devoid of the intrinsic nature of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba /
translated: Suchness is devoid of the intrinsic nature of suchness.

original: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang; chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang; chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
translated: Unmistaken suchness, unaltered suchness, the true nature of dharmas, the dharma-constituent, the establishment of dharmas, the certification of dharmas, and the very limit of reality are devoid of the intrinsic nature of the very limit of reality.

original: de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: That is how the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: know it as it really is.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o //
translated: therefore you should know that the bodhisattva great beings are not separated from the perfection of wisdom.🔽Śāradvatīputra said,

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
analyzed: gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
translated: what is the intrinsic nature of form?

original: tshor ba dang / 'du @199b shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du @199b shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
translated: What is the intrinsic nature of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness?

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
translated: What is the intrinsic nature of the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination?

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
translated: What is the intrinsic nature up to of the very limit of reality?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The nature of form is non-entity.🔽The nature of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is non-entity.🔽The nature of the constituents, the sense fields, and dependent origination is non-entity.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //🔽skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o // skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The nature of the reality limit is non-entity.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: through this one of many explanations

original: khams rnams la khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: khams rnams la khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o //
translated: The elements have no intrinsic nature of the elements, and dependent origination has no intrinsic nature of dependent origination, up to the very limit of reality has no intrinsic nature of the very limit of reality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do //🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //🔽skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi @200a *//
analyzed: gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do // skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi @200a *//
translated: Furthermore, form has no characteristic of form,

original: mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med do //
translated: feeling has no characteristic of feeling, perception has no characteristic of perception, volitional factors have no characteristic of volitional factors, and consciousness has no characteristic of consciousness.

original: khams rnams la khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: khams rnams la khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
